title: Authentificate
name: Login
description:
You have to provide the username OR the email.
After the login, you have to provide the private token returned by the login in EVERY request in the Authorization header.

Success 200.description: All the subscribed current user courses news.

Error 4xx.description: Conflict with the new username or email.

title: Add tags to course
name: AddTags
description: Tags that does not exists will be ignored (no 422 returned).

title: Add teachers to course
name: AddTeachers
description: Teachers that does not exists will be ignored (no 422 returned).

path.description: The path where to create the folder.

query.description: True if the file is hidden, false otherwise.

payload.description: An array files to be deleted from the course.
The tags to be removed from the course.
An array of teachers usernames to be removed from the course.

title: Get all the students subscribed to a course
name: GetCourseStudents

title: Get the list of documents in a directory
name: GetCourseTree

Success 200.description: An object with the parent directory and the files.

query.description: Get by code or name of the course (OR condition).

Success 200.description: An object with metadata and array of results if pagination is true or an array of results if pagination is false.

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content:
curl -X POST http://localhost/courses -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     -H "Authorization: private_token" -d '{"name": "Course Name", "code": "Course code"}'

path.description: The path where to upload the document.

query.description: True if the file is hidden, false otherwise.

payload.description: True if the file is to be hidden.

title: Get one tag
name: GetTag
description: Not very useful route because tag is just a name, but still exists.
